00029 #   define __cdecl __attribute__((cdecl))
00030 #   define __stdcall __attribute__((stdcall))
00031 #endif

00041 template <class T>
00042 class JanitorRestore {
00043 private:
00044         T& m_control;
00045         T  m_value;
00046         bool m_enabled;
00047 public:
00048         JanitorRestore<T>(T& control, bool enabl = true) :
00049                 m_control(control), m_value(control), m_enabled(enabl) {}
00050         ~JanitorRestore<T>()
00051         {
00052                 if (m_enabled)
00053                         m_control = m_value;
00054         }
00055         
00056         void disable(void)
00057                 { m_enabled = false; }
00058         
00059         void enable(void)
00060                 { m_enabled = true; }
00061 };

00150 template <class T, typename R = void>
00151 class JanitorClassFunc {
00152 public:
00153         typedef R (T::*t_func_JanitorClasssFunc)(void);
00154 private:
00155         T& m_control;
00156         t_func_JanitorClasssFunc m_funcJCF;
00157         bool m_enabled;
00158 public:
00159         
00160         JanitorClassFunc<T,R>(T& control, t_func_JanitorClasssFunc func, bool enabl = true) :
00161                 m_control(control), m_funcJCF(func), m_enabled(enabl)
00162         {
00163         }
00164         ~JanitorClassFunc<T,R>()
00165         {
00166                 if (m_enabled)
00167                         (m_control.*m_funcJCF)();
00168         }
00169         
00170         void disable(void)
00171                 { m_enabled = false; }
00172         
00173         void enable(void)
00174                 { m_enabled = true; }
00175 };

00258         
00259         JanitorFunc2<Param1Type,Param2Type,ResultType>(t_func_JanitorFunc func, Param1Type& control1, Param2Type& control2, bool enabl = true) :
00260                 m_funcJF(func), m_control1(control1), m_control1(control2), m_enabled(enabl) {}
00261         ~JanitorFunc2<Param1Type,Param2Type,ResultType>()

00264                         (*m_funcJF)(m_control1,m_control2);

00281 template <class T, class C, typename R = void>
00282 class JanitorLogFunc {
00283 public:
00284         typedef R (__cdecl * t_func_JanitorLogFunc)(const char*,...);
00285 private:
00286         const char* m_str;
00287         T& m_control;
00288         t_func_JanitorLogFunc m_funcJF;
00289         bool m_enabled;
00290 public:
00291         
00292         JanitorLogFunc<T,C,R>(t_func_JanitorLogFunc func, const char* str, T& control, bool enable = true) :
00293                 m_funcJF(func), m_str(str), m_control(control), m_enabled(enable) {}
00294         ~JanitorLogFunc<T,C,R>()
00295         {
00296                 if (m_enabled)
00297                         (*m_funcJF)(m_str,(C) m_control);
00298         }
00299         
00300         void disable(void)
00301                 { m_enabled = false; }
00302         
00303         void enable(void)
00304                 { m_enabled = true; }
00305 };

00345 template <class T>
00346 class JanitorSet {
00347 private:
00348         T& m_control;
00349         T  m_value;
00350         bool m_enabled;
00351 public:
00352         JanitorSet<T>(T& control, const T& val, bool enabl = true) :
00353                 m_control(control), m_value(val), m_enabled(enabl) {}
00354         ~JanitorSet<T>()
00355         {
00356                 if (m_enabled)
